00034 #include "ShapeImprover.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqTimer.hpp"
00036 #include "MsqDebug.hpp"
00037 #include "PMeanPTemplate.hpp"
00038 #include "ElementPMeanP.hpp"
00039 #include "ConjugateGradient.hpp"
00040 #include "TerminationCriterion.hpp"
00041 #include "InstructionQueue.hpp"
00042 #include "QualityAssessor.hpp"
00043 
00044 #include "TShapeB1.hpp"
00045 #include "TShapeNB1.hpp"
00046 #include "TQualityMetric.hpp"
00047 #include "IdealShapeTarget.hpp"
00048 
00049 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00050 
00051 const double DEFAULT_BETA = 0.005;
00052 const int DEFUALT_PARALLEL_ITERATIONS = 10;
00053 
00054 ShapeImprover::ShapeImprover() 
00055  : maxTime(-1.0), 
00056    mBeta(DEFAULT_BETA),
00057    parallelIterations(DEFUALT_PARALLEL_ITERATIONS)
00058 {}
00059 
00060 void ShapeImprover::set_vertex_movement_limit_factor( double beta )
00061 {
00062   assert(beta > 0.0);
00063   assert(beta < 1.0);
00064   mBeta = beta;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void ShapeImprover::set_cpu_time_limit( double limit )
00068 {
00069   assert(limit >= 0.0);
00070   maxTime = limit;
00071 }
00072 
00073 void ShapeImprover::set_parallel_iterations( int count )
00074 {
00075   if (count < 1) {
00076     assert(false);
00077     count = 1;
00078   }
00079   parallelIterations = count;
00080 }
00081 
00082 void ShapeImprover::run_wrapper( Mesh* mesh,
00083                                 ParallelMesh* pmesh,
00084                                 MeshDomain* domain,
00085                                 Settings* settings,
00086                                 QualityAssessor* qa,
00087                                 MsqError& err )
00088 {
00089     // Quality Metrics
00090   IdealShapeTarget target;
00091     // No-barrier phase
00092   TShapeNB1 mu_no;
00093   TQualityMetric metric_no_0( &target, &mu_no );
00094   ElementPMeanP metric_no( 1.0, &metric_no_0 );
00095     // Barrier phase
00096   TShapeB1 mu_b;
00097   TQualityMetric metric_b_0( &target, &mu_b );
00098   ElementPMeanP metric_b( 1.0, &metric_b_0 );
00099     // QualityAssessor
00100   qa->add_quality_assessment( &metric_no );
00101   qa->add_quality_assessment( &metric_b );
00102   
00103 
00104     // Phase 1: use non-barrier metric until mesh does not
00105     //          have any inverted elements
00106   PMeanPTemplate obj_func_no( 1.0, &metric_no );
00107   ConjugateGradient improver_no( &obj_func_no );
00108   improver_no.use_global_patch();
00109   TerminationCriterion inner_no;
00110   inner_no.add_absolute_vertex_movement_edge_length( mBeta );
00111   inner_no.add_untangled_mesh();
00112   if (maxTime > 0.0)
00113     inner_no.add_cpu_time( maxTime );
00114   improver_no.set_inner_termination_criterion( &inner_no );
00115   InstructionQueue q_no;
00116   Timer totalTimer;
00117   q_no.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00118   q_no.set_master_quality_improver( &improver_no, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00119   q_no.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00120   q_no.run_common( mesh, pmesh, domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00121   
00122     // Phase 2: use-barrer metric on untangled mesh
00123   PMeanPTemplate obj_func_b( 1.0, &metric_b );
00124   ConjugateGradient improver_b( &obj_func_b );
00125   improver_b.use_global_patch();
00126   TerminationCriterion inner_b;
00127   inner_b.add_absolute_vertex_movement_edge_length( mBeta );
00128   if (maxTime > 0.0) {
00129     double remaining = maxTime - totalTimer.since_birth();
00130     if (remaining <= 0.0 ){
00131       //MSQ_DBGOUT(2) << "Optimization is terminating without perfoming shape improvement." << std::endl;
00132       remaining = 0.0;
00133     }
00134     inner_b.add_cpu_time( remaining );
00135   }
00136   improver_b.set_inner_termination_criterion( &inner_b );
00137   InstructionQueue q_b;
00138   q_b.set_master_quality_improver( &improver_b, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00139   q_b.add_quality_assessor( qa, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00140   q_b.run_common( mesh, pmesh, domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00141 }
00142 
00143 } // namespace MESQUITE_NS
